definition: to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode

sentences.english: Owns the top causticity-resistance of pure PTFE.
sentences.chinese: 具有純PTFE優異的耐腐蝕性。

sentences.english: A new method was applied to the test of corrosion resistance of SiC-Si3N4 material.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氮化硅結合碳化硅材料耐腐蝕性能的測試方法。

sentences.english: Aluminized coating has fine corrosion-resistant and heat-resistant abiliities.
sentences.chinese: 鍍鋁層具有良好的耐高溫性和耐腐蝕性。

sentences.english: Paper-site thermal spray dryer wear-resistant corrosion-resistant alloys, grinding polishing.
sentences.chinese: 造紙烘缸現場熱噴塗耐磨耐腐蝕合金。

sentences.english: The 6061 series of aluminum has good corrosion resistance.
sentences.chinese: 6061系列的鋁具有良好的耐腐蝕性。

sentences.english: The water tank without welds, excellent corrosion resistance, long service life.
sentences.chinese: 水箱內膽無焊點焊縫，耐腐蝕性能絕佳，壽命長。

sentences.english: It pipeline valve selection to choose the anti-sulfur corrosion-resistant materials.
sentences.chinese: 故管線閥門選材要選耐腐蝕的抗硫材料。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to improve corrosion resistance property of magnesium and its alloys.
sentences.chinese: 因此，增強鎂及鎂合金的耐腐蝕性能是非常必要的。

sentences.english: In some environments, they can exhibit poor corrosion resistance.
sentences.chinese: 在某些環境中，它們的耐腐蝕性較差。

sentences.english: Head and cap are machined from 304 stainless steel for corrosion resistance.
sentences.chinese: 頭和加工上限從304不鏽鋼的耐腐蝕性。

sentences.english: Deposited metal can meet high welding quality and corrosion resistance.
sentences.chinese: 熔敷金屬能滿足較高的焊接質量和耐腐蝕性能。

sentences.english: It is resistant to tension, and it is resistant to corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 這樣抗拉力大，而且耐腐蝕。

sentences.english: It has high and low temperature resistance, corrosion resistance, non-absorbent and other excellent features.
sentences.chinese: 它具有高低溫，耐腐蝕，不吸水等優良特性。

sentences.english: Recessed box is ABS with corrosion and impact resistance.
sentences.chinese: 預埋件爲ABS，耐腐蝕，抗衝擊。

sentences.english: Silicon Nitride is anti-magnetic and resistant to corrosion by most substances.
sentences.chinese: 氮化硅是一種反磁性和耐腐蝕大多數物質。

sentences.english: Monel is also very resistant to strong caustic solutions.
sentences.chinese: 蒙乃爾對於強鹼也具有很好的耐腐蝕性。
